content.query:
CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE ExecuteR1Query AS
BEGIN
    -- R1 Query Logic
    WITH NextEvent AS (
        SELECT x1.cheID,
               x1.operatorName,
               x1.typeDescription AS EcEventType,
               x1.EcEventTime,
               x1.ecEventGkey,
               x1.Year,
               x1.Month,
               x1.Week,
               x2.operatorName AS NextOperator,
               x2.typeDescription AS NextEcEvent,
               x2.EcEventTime AS NextEcEventEcEventTime,
               CASE 
                   WHEN x1.typeDescription = x2.typeDescription THEN 'NO' 
                   ELSE 'YES'
               END AS CorrectCycle,
                (SELECT TOP 1 ime.t_put
                FROM dbo.move_history ime
                WHERE (ime.Fetch_CHE_Id = x1.cheID or ime.Put_CHE_Id = x1.cheID)
                    AND ime.t_put < x2.EcEventTime
                ORDER BY ime.t_put DESC)
               AS LastMoveEventEcEventTime,
			   ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY x2.cheID ORDER BY x2.EcEventTime ASC) as row_num
        FROM dbo.ecevents x1
        LEFT JOIN dbo.ecevents x2
		ON x1.cheID = x2.cheID
        AND x2.EcEventTime > x1.EcEventTime
        WHERE x1.typeDescription = 'LGON'
        AND x2.typeDescription IN ('LGON', 'LGOF')
		AND x1.cheKind Like 'RTG%'
    )
    SELECT
        ne.ecEventGkey,
        ne.cheID,
        ne.operatorName,
        ne.EcEventType,
        ne.EcEventTime,
        ne.NextOperator,
        ne.NextEcEvent,
        ne.NextEcEventEcEventTime,
        ne.CorrectCycle,
        ne.LastMoveEventEcEventTime,
        CASE
            WHEN ne.CorrectCycle = 'YES' 
            THEN DATEDIFF(MINUTE, ne.EcEventTime, ne.NextEcEventEcEventTime) / 60.0
            ELSE DATEDIFF(MINUTE, ne.EcEventTime, ne.LastMoveEventEcEventTime) / 60.0
        END AS TotalWorkinghrs,
        ne.Year,
        ne.Month,
        ne.Week
    FROM NextEvent ne
	WHERE row_num = 1
    ORDER BY ne.cheID, ne.EcEventTime;
END
